data.title: Good pizza for Fremont. Nice lively dining area.
data.text: What I liked about this place most is the lively dining atmosphere with large screen TVs set to the Warriors game. The pizza was good -- we had a plain cheese & a masala paneer pizza. 2 smalls was way too much, so one small was enough for 2 of us. We also got garlic bread which was huge. It is clean. Service was professional.

data.title: Pizza with a Kick
data.text:
The name is what drew us in...We love Curry and we love Pizza, this should be interesting...right?  We weren't disappointed.  They got it right!  We tried their Pepperoni (just in case) and Chicken Marsala.  

Their Pepperoni wasn't very good but the Chicken Marsala was delicious with a kick.  The process of making a pizza changed the taste of Chicken Marsala but the pizza itself was still tasty.  

Definitely a place to try if no other reason then to say you've had CURRY PIZZA :)

data.title: Curry Pizza is a MUST
data.text:
Came here because of the positive Yelp reviews and because they make Desi Pizza!  How can you not want to try this out?  Came here with a group so we were able to try a variety of items.  We ordered the Tandoori Wings, a plain cheese pizza, the Chili Paneer Pizza, and the Curry Chicken Masala pizza and everything was phenomenal...even the plain cheese pizza!!!!  Everything was flavorful and tasty but be warned, the desi pizzas definitely had a kick. 

The restaurant itself is small but clean with a tiny "arcade" in the back.  If you're in the area, check this place out.

data.title: Excellent Curry Pizza
data.text: If you like Pizza and Indian food especially curry, you should try curry pizza and the best place to try in Fremont is Curry Pizza House. The chicken tikka pizza is spicy and hot. Try the curry chicken masala or tandoori chicken pizza if you can't handle the heat. Pizza came out hot with crunchy crust in less than 15 minutes, but they do get busy sometimes with lots of take out and deliveries. Service is excellent and restaurant is nice and clean. Prices are $11/15/18/23 for a small/med/large/Xlarge pizza. Traditional pizzas are also served with small salad bar.
